task.title: Defining collections
task.shortdesc: You can define collections of topics within a hierarchy or relationship table or on their own.

taskbody.context: By default, sibling topics in a hierarchy or table cell are unrelated, except through their common relationships to other topics. You can define them as related by setting the collection-type attribute on their container to sequence (each sibling is related to its immediately preceding and following siblings) or family (all siblings are related to each other).
